segments.text: Anna , Would you like to dance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d love to , but I ’ m a terrible dancer . I ’ m afraid I may step on your toes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t worry about it . I ’ ll show you how . It ’ s a piece of cake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I ’ ll try my best .
segments.speaker: S2
